title: Tobacco Cards on Sale at this Year's National
author: Steve_NY

posts.post_title: Tobacco Cards on Sale at this Year's National
posts.post_content:
I will be bringing the following this year: Just a selection. If you are coming to this year's National, be aware that MItch and I can only help one person each at a time. We will not violate that policy so please be patient if we are busy.

I will be bringing a selection of all Tobacco cards, probably 600+ baseball, all ungraded. I will be selling them at 20% off my prices, and if you buy enough even more off of that. 

Stop by at Booth 305P.

Steve_NY
